title: Partnership with American Journalism Project to support local news
summary: The American Journalism Project (AJP) has announced a partnership with OpenAI to explore how artificial intelligence (AI) can support local news organizations. OpenAI will provide $5 million in funding to AJP and up to $5 million in API credits to help grantee organizations assess and deploy AI technologies. The collaboration aims to develop tools that can assist local news organizations and establish dialogue between the industry and OpenAI. AJP plans to use the funds to build a support structure for community-driven local news organizations to expand their capacities through AI and counter misinformation.
